title: Save up for Rengar or buy Riven. Or someone else?
body: Should I save up for rengar(I'm on 4800 ip currently) or buy riven now. I don't want ranged champs due to my poor ability to play them. So if you guys recommend someone else, ranged is not my go to champs. I play assassins like talon or yasuo(apparently riot confirmed this. Source: Mid or AFK). And other melee champs . At my level ip takes 4ever to earn so leave ur suggestions and opinions below. Thanks. :)

replies.body: I already have a full rune page for ad and ap. but thanks for your opinion. :)
of course the assassin main only plays with 2 rune pages, neither of which would be considered safe or tanky of any semblance

First of all I'm not a assassin main...I just play a few assassins...and I'm level 22, so I don't need like 5 rune pages... If u want to criticise me give me some constructive feedback, instead of trying to act like ur too good for this game...
If it's not Riven, it's acceptable to a certain degree.

here we see, the ever-present 12 year old in its natural habitat, deciding which flashy assassin to instalock in his next ranked games before hes forced to go to bed to wake up for school tomorrow or he'll get grounded
What was the point of this?
it seems the boy is unfamiliar with attenborough commentary and now considers me a threat. as much a threat as an actually decent skirmisher to his squishy low dps assassins that he mains

well neither riven or rengar are considered top picks any more. both are still viable , both are fun to play , though riven is outclassed by alot of other popular tops atm , like darius and olaf. rengar can still be pretty effective , he is one of the few stealth based champs that is. For an assassin jungle , he is one of the very best.

Rengar is definitely the best pick here. Riven is due for nerfs and she's cheesy as hell. Rengar is good in most metas, and can be a great carry at all levels of play. If you take a look at the NA Challenger Ladder there are a lot of Rengar mains.
